text: Andrea Vescovi (born 3 November 1994) is an Italian sport shooter. He participated at the 2018 ISSF World Shooting Championships, winning a medal.Team double trap results ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Italian male sport shooters Category:Trap and double trap shooters Category:People from Città di Castello Category:Universiade gold medalists for Italy Category:Universiade medalists in shooting Category:Medalists at the 2015 Summer Universiade
title: Andrea Vescovi
